ticket_details.description:
1. URL Field
2. Have an area for raw text
3. Have a “load from JIRA” button
4. Have a button to Generate test plan 
5. Have a button to generate RTM
6. Have multiple tabs for ticket, rtm, requirement,...

1. Enable exporting the generated test plan for documentation or audits.
Acceptance Criteria
1.  “Download JSON” button
2. “Download PDF” button
3. PDF mirrors UI layout
Technical Notes
1. Use backend...

summary: Test cases generated for all requirements with multiple intents covered, including happy path and negative scenarios. | Test cases generated for exporting functionality including JSON and PDF downloads, with coverage for happy paths and negative scenarios.

api_tests.expected_result: System automatically performs: [5]. Have a button to generate RTM
steps: Create a test plan containing at least one requirement and one test case.
Allow the system to complete test plan generation.
Verify that a Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM) is generated automatically.
Verify the RTM contains exactly one entry per requirement.
Verify each RTM entry includes requirement ID, description, associated test case IDs, and coverage status.
api_tests.title: System-level happy path: [5]. Have a button to generate RTM

steps: Prepare a valid request with all required fields as specified in the requirement
Send the request to the system
Observe the response and verify it contains the expected data and status
